extendedInfo.description: Access the Berkeley Public Library from wherever you are!  Search our catalog, place items on hold, and download e-books and MP3 audiobooks directly to your device.  This app will also provide access to most features of your account. You can even view The BPL Event Calendar and Research Guides with this app.  There is a whole world of possibilities at BPL, now it is available on your mobile device.  Enjoy!
